You keep the lock.
And I will take this key.
We will wear them all the time, and treasure them forever.
Someday, when we are all grown up and meet again,
I will use this key to unlock what is been tucked away.
And then...

Episode 1: The Promise
Episode 1: The Promise
Episode 1: The Promise
All right.
Hey!
Breakfast is ready, ya bozos!
Yo!
Good morning, Young Master!
Ichijou Raku
Damn!
Deeelish!
That is our Young Master for ya, the master chef!
Nothing beats a breakfast cooked by our beloved heir apparent!
Who are you callin' heir apparent?
I keep telling you guys...
I am never going to join the yakuza!
Huh?
No way!
I want to graduate from a top university,
get a nice civil servant job,
and walk the straight and narrow, looking right up at the sun!
My god...
You sure like to make a ruckus every morning.
Dad!
Hey, Boss!
Good morning, Boss!
Raku, before I forget...
We need to sit down and talk about some important matters sometime soon.
Do not forget.
Important matters?
All right, Young Master!
We wish you the best of days!
The best of days!
Oh, yeah.
Almost forgot, Young Master...
There is a new gang that is starting to stir up trouble on our turf.
New gang?
Keep your eyes peeled, young master.
I am so over this day-after-day violence!
Man, what I would give to have a nice, tranquil life.
Now that I think about it, I spend so much of my time studying to get into a good school,
that I almost never socialize with girls, let alone date them.
Well, actually...
I did have a girlfriend.
Just that once, but still...
Until now my life has been a never-ending struggle.
Oh, crap!
I am going to be late!
But this particular day,
was the one that changed everything.
From this day forward...
my daily struggle would become all the more agonizing.
Sorry!
I am in a hurry!
I am really sorry!
Wh-What was that?
Hey, Raku... Whoa!
Hold up!
Ichijou-kun?
How did you hurt yourself?
Are you okay?
Your nose is bleeding!
Oh, hey!
Onodera!
I-I am fine, I am fine.
Totally fine!
What?
You were the victim of a hit-and-run by a girl?
Get real!
Who just jumps over a fence and knees a guy in the face?
I am serious!
Wait a sec.
I will get you a band-aid.
Onodera, you do not have to do that, really.
Of course I do!
What if it gets infected?
Come on.
There.
Whoa, Onodera's so close.
Maybe this injury is not so bad after all.
Good for you, Raku!
Shut up!
Onodera Kosaki
Today started off in the worst possible way,
but at least I got to chat with Onodera.
Maybe it is not all that bad.
Okay, class!
I would like to introduce you to our new transfer student!
Come on in, Kirisaki-san.
All right.
Hello, everybody!
I am Kirisaki Chitoge.
I just moved here from America.
My mom's Japanese and my dad's American, so I am biracial.
But as you can see, I speak Japanese just fine,
so please do not hesitate to talk to me!
Wow!
She is so cute!
That is one hot babe!
Check out those legs!
She looks like a model!
She says she is half-American!
I have never seen anyone so hot!
All right, why do not you find yourself an empty seat in the back for now?
You are that...
That barbaric girl!
Bar...
Girl?
Hey!
Who are you calling barbaric?
You nailed me with your knee in the courtyard, remember?
Well, I apologized, did not I?
I barely bumped into you,
so quit pretending it hurt, will you?
What do you mean, barely?
I nearly blacked out!
Oh, did you?
You should get checked for low blood pressure!
I am apologizing, if you have not noticed,
so why do not you just let it go and stop being such a crybaby?
In what world is that an apology?!
Monkey girl!
Who are you calling a monkey girl?
Kirisaki Chitoge
Okay, I am counting on you, Ichijou.
Stay away from me, got it?
Your impotence might be contagious.
Right back at you!
The last thing I want is to turn into a monkey like you!
I did not say anything!
My first day with the new girl
Damn it, what is her problem?
I have never met such a barbaric, annoying girl!
She is nothing like Onodera, or that girl I made that promise with.
We never did meet again, not even once.
But man...
If only Onodera and I were like that...
Yeah, right!
It must have been when I got that swift knee to the face.
Why should I help you find it?
Well, I lost it because of your thunderous knee,
so you are partially at fault here, too.
I keep thinking it over, and that is the only time it could have happened!
What is the matter, Ichijou-kun?
Onodera...
Well, I just lost something important.
You did?
Can I help?
Oh, no!
It is her fault that I lost it, so it goes without saying that she should help.
What did you say?
So, what kind of pendant are we looking for?
The chain's about this long, and there is a lock shaped like this on the end...
Is not that...
You have seen it somewhere?
Oh, sorry.
I could be mistaken...
Probably...
Fine.
If I help you look for the pendant,
will you promise not to talk to me in schoolever again?
I cannot stand guys who get worked up about every little thing.
I would hate for anyone to think I was friends with such a petty guy.
Oh, right, I forgot to tell you something, Ichijou.
I am putting you in charge of helping Kirisaki adjust to her new school,
so I have decided to let her help you...
take care of the school's pets.
Thanks a bunch!
Why is this happening to me?
Hey, you promised not to talk to me, remember?
You think we can accomplish anything without speaking to each other?
Besides, we are not actually in school.
Oh, spare me.
Damn it...
Why the hell do I have to work with this bitch?
Come on!
We are going to use the extra time to look for your pendant!
You do not have to tell me!

My second day with the vicious woman
Gosh, Japanese is confusing...
Here.
What is this?
My notes from Japanese class.
You were having a hard time keeping up, were not you?
I thought I told you not to talk to me!
Who asked for your help, anyway?
You goddamn bitch!
My third day with the barbaric girl
Yo, Raku.
When did you and Kirisaki-san get so close?
What gave you that idea?
Well, everybody sees you together a lot.
Plus you have that thing after school.
And to top it off, your conversations have that friendly vibe going on...
Friendly?
How is she friendly to me?
Look, Kirisaki-san's a knockout babe, you know?
A lot of guys are curious about her.
Like, why did she choose this school of all places?
Or why did she move at such an odd time?
Stuff like that.
A knockout?
That thing?!
Awesome!
She turns more ape-like by the second.
What the hell are you doing?
See if I ever help you again!
I said I was sorry!
Kirisaki-san!

My fourth day with the acrobatic girl
Jeez, that gorilla woman!
What kind of upbringing makes a person that belligerent?
Big Bro!
We had another run-in with that new gang on Third Street!
What the hell?
That is the third time this week!
Well, not that I am one to talk.
Here you go, Ichijou-kun.
O-Oh, thanks!
You have been getting pretty roughed up, lately.
I am telling you, that new girl will punch you at the drop of a hat!
You say that, and yet you are still so nice to her.
That is what I admire about you, Ichijou-kun.
You even offered to lend her your notes, right?
I saw you.
Y-You did, huh?
Whoa!
I did not know she was watching!
I am so happy!
Oh, I wanted to ask you...
That pendant you are looking for...
Where did you buy it?
Actually, someone gave it to me, a while back.
Ten years ago, I think.
Y-You take really good care of your belongings, do not you?
I made this promise, you see.
It is an important keepsake.
A promise...
My sixth day with the gorilla woman
Oh, for crying out loud, we are never going to find it!
Shut up.
You are the one who said that you do not like whiners, remember?
Come to think of it, why did you move here at such a weird time, anyway?
Why do you want to know?
No reason.
Because of my parents' work.
So what do your parents do?
What is it to you?
Why should I have to give you of all people my life story?
I am going to look over there.
Okay...
Wait...
This scent...
It smells strangely familiar.
Somehow, it makes me feel nostalgic.
A scent that I have always been familiar with...
But where is it from?
So that is the new gang, huh?
Is it just me, or is this getting worse by the day?
My seventh day with Kirisaki
You are late, Kirisaki.
Hurry up and give me a hand.
Jeez!
I cannot take it anymore!
I am so over this!
Wh-What the hell's your problem now?
You will never guess what some girls from class were asking!
Hey, Kirisaki-san...
Are you dating Ichijou-kun?
I mean, you guys look like you are getting along so well,
and I hear you have been hanging out together after school, too.
That is what!
What the...
Who... the... hell would get along with you?!
The only reason I am with you after class is because I am nice enough to join you in this ridiculous hunt!
Nothing more!
The committee meeting ended early today,
so maybe I will help Ichijou-kun look for his pendant.
Give me a break!
Are you forgetting that you are the one who knocked it out of my hand?
Only because you were not holding onto it like you should have been!
Seriously!
A grown man so torn apart by the loss of a pendant!
Does losing your favorite teddy bear keep you up at night too?
What?
Did some girl you had a crush on give it to you or something?
You are unbelievable!
Dwelling on something so far in the past...
How girly can you get?
I bet whoever it was does not even remember you anymore!
That is beyond lame!
It is totally absurd!
You shut the hell up!
If that is how you feel, then you do not have to help me!
Just get out of my face!
Fine by me.
I went and did it.
I blew my top in front of a woman.
My eleventh day with Chitoge
I bet whoever it was does not even remember you anymore!
It is totally absurd!
Damn it!
Ichijou-kun!
Kirisaki-san is asking for you.
Why does she want to see me over here?
That girl...
That is not Kirisaki, is it?
Ow!
What the hell was that for?
A-Are you all right, Ichijou-kun?
Is this my...
Is that yours?
Yeah.
But why did she have it?
Kirisaki-san kept looking for it after she left.
She made sure to keep it a secret.
She told me not to tell you, though.
Translate it if you can!!
I fulfilled my duty.
So do not talk to me anymore.
Scum bastard.
Chitoge.
I cannot read it, but it is clear that she is making fun of me.
She is not the least bit cute.
Whatever.
She is incredibly annoying, but I guess she is not all bad.
And besides, she did have a point.
Maybe it is about time I put this promise behind me.
No...
No, you cannot!
Ichijou-kun, you made a promise with someone, right?
If that person remembers the promise, too...
then it would make them really sad if you gave up, right?
Even if it was ten years ago, and you were just kids...
You never know.
Maybe it is still important to her.
Onodera?
Wait...
There is no way...
Oh...
Sorry!
That was a strange thing to say!
Uh, no...
Thanks, Onodera.
I think I feel better now.
You are right.
It does not matter if I see her again or not.
The fact of the matter is that it is important to me.
And I will continue to cherish it.
Thanks for everything, Onodera.
All right, see you later!
Sure, see you later!
I could not bring myself to ask him... again.
I am such an idiot.
I am home!
Hey, is that you, Raku?
What is going on, Dad?
This is pretty sudden.
I told you we have important?
matters to discuss, remember?
I am sure you know about our recent skirmishes with that other gang,
but it looks like we are headed towards all-out war.
What?
Are we going to be okay if war breaks out?
Which brings up my next point!
Actually, the boss of the other gang is an old friend of mine.
And I hear he is got a daughter the same age as you...
And so, Raku, my boy.
I was wondering if you would mind becoming an item with that girl?
Oh, come on.
All you have to do is fake it.
If the heirs of each gang are in love,
the young guns would put an end to their squabbling.
N-No, even if that would work, you have got to be kidding me!
No way can I do that!
After all, I...
You what?
Do you already have a girlfriend?
Dad...
Sorry, but there are lives at stake here.
Complain all you want, but you are not getting out of this, got it?
All right, then!
Come on in!
What, she is already here?
Well, I guess there is nothing I can do.
And it is supposed to be an act, anyways.
It will probably be all over in a couple of days.
I told you!
It is not like I have decided to go through with it yet!
Yeah, but I hear he is quite the stud, you know?
What?
No, no, even still!
Huh?
That voice...
Now, then.
This young lady is going to be your girlfriend.
I am still not mentally prepared.
In that instant, the pieces all fell into place.
Why this girl had transferred in at such an odd time of year,
why she was reluctant to talk about her family,
and why the scent she gave off seemed so nostalgic to me.
That is right, it is the smell...
of gunpowder.
This young lady here is Miss Kirisaki Chitoge.
Starting tomorrow, you two are going to be girlfriend and boyfriend
Three Years
for the next three years.
And so that is how two kids with no chemistry became a couple.
This fake love of ours would end up guiding me to that promise made ten years ago...
but I had no way of knowing that yet.
